post.body: need to get that qtip and check it. i hear it grows on you.
need to get over there tomorrow. i'm due a landlocked sunday.
still can't believe it! she's so happy to be back!
yes indeed - snowglobes have much less actionscript, and much better randomness.
bwahahahahahaha! i'll keep that in mind.
if it has anything to do with your ealier tweet about drinking with europeans, it makes perfect sense.
snowed end of last week but it melted off monday. mostly rainy/cold/drizzle/nasty.
wow - uncanny!
yep historic day for the iu network! ;)
wow i need an mp3? ok - this is getting serious! ;)
hellyes! eminem-style multisyllabic rhymes are the tough part. 'blagojevich destroyin shit' is the closest i can get.
blah goy ah vich - i think your challenge may stand for awhile.
if you still have an id, you can get cheap dvd versions when you're here again.
so in your pinata metaphor, is free coffee = candy?
360 degrees of puppies?
i think that coldplay/satriani youtube video is one of my favorites in a good while. too funny!
i agree - the whole pandora experience for me is lacking. last.fm isn't perfect, but so much better.
ford blowing money like they have it?
yeah all us cool kids.
absolutely not - also not too late for my 2nd coffee.
that's good. it runs you about $100k to do so, i've heard. ;)
man, life without yo! just isn't the same. ;)
i follow you because you earned it. i knew of (and was affected by) the fray way before twitter and its "celebs"
nice glad that was the match. my printer is an epson stylus photo r380.
1942 Report? http://www.1001freefonts.com/1942report.php
ha! catscratch fever so bad, it's good. good morning, badself.
i keep hearing about autotune overload on that kanye!
yes - expedit is the way: http://www.ikea.com/us/en/catalog/categories/series/09064/
congrats on the found bags!
yes yes
yes you can (over a network)! i am not running for president of anything. ;)
you need some office homies! it's nice they left the lights on for the empty offices here.
i win all the work! ummm.... right. good afternoon, badself. ;)
yep this is what i get for having no help all year and taking mental health days as a result. merry f'n xmas to me!
diagnosis: exactly. i will be calling them tonight to say just that.
when it arrives, you must wear the apple sticker on your forehead.
holy crap! frida was taken into the shelter! deb is picking her up now! http://tinyurl.com/56ceuk
frida's home now! super purry and spazzing out.
just used picnik via flickr to update that photo. http://tinyurl.com/56nsyo
shelter says frida was found on a street almost in elletsville! the people that brought her in fed her for 2 weeks. how did she get there?!?
that's 6.1 miles from here. frida is a tough little thing, that's for sure. will never know if someone found her and took her there, though.
this coldplay v satriani thing is pretty hilarious. http://tinyurl.com/6gfmop
had the nastiest bit of malware i've had in years. http://www.malwarebytes.org/ was the only thing that worked.
something's up with my hot water heater. lukewarm shaving is the worst.
tis the season to dust off the flash snow script.
woohoo my mac can print on this silly windows server network. thanks me! no problem, me.
waiting for java applets to load from across campus so i can eventually go home.
if you missed the piece on 60 minutes last night about saudi oil, it's very interesting: http://tinyurl.com/6kek5m
that's as far as i'm taking that. co-workers going to have to do the rest tomorrow.
frida is coughing a lot tonight. maybe a cold from being outside for the last 2 months. she's going to the vet in the morning.
woohoo almost willed a full cs4 production premium download out of the iu network. one more .dmg to go!
adobe xmas has brought iu's network to a crawl.
rob blagojevich doesn't want to sell guns, wants to make money. don of don's guns doesn't want to make money, wants to sell guns.
last.fm's app makes me so happy when i don't feel like digging around for music.
woohoo - no vet this morning. false alarm that directly followed my actual real alarm.
is slowly reclaiming his inbox.
if you were at 'the show' at market square arena the summer of 1990, you are a small part of this song. http://... ♫ http://blip.fm/~14ajj
incredible beat. glad this is the instrumental, nothing against serch. ♫ http://blip.fm/~14af8
primo and guru in top form. ♫ http://blip.fm/~14ac5
hello BROOKLYYYYYN!!! ♫ http://blip.fm/~14a7d
i'm outspoken my language is broken into a slang but it's just a dialect that i select when i hang. ♫ http://blip.fm/~14a2p
i really don't know what this world is coming to. ♫ http://blip.fm/~149yp
remember when every episode of yo! mtv raps consisted of this, a special ed video and a rob base video? ♫ http://blip.fm/~149uq
it's been a long time. ♫ http://blip.fm/~149n3
i need to unsubscribe from all my inbox fillers.
had to pill frida this morning. claws + morning = yuck.
great time in indy today! lunch with @elharmonz and @dareolonoh, then up to brainstorm to see @bobblass, @illig and co.
is tired of fighting for a lost cause.
get in on dollar tuesday for the National Multiple Sclerosis Society! http://www.bcause08.com/
and digidesign wants $150 for a protools upgrade to version 8. i paid for a 7.x release that crashed my pc like crazy. never again.
is there a mac version of the quadro cx? nvidia: currently exploring the demand for a mac version for a possible early 2009 release. buh?
has one of these in his office. http://tinyurl.com/4x8tue
awesome. just lost all my color correcting due to a premiere crash. been putting of rebuilding the macpro for too long.
color correcting video. who am i to say a color is incorrect?
i have colleagues that tell me they're bored most days. yet they're taking vacation days, and i'm here. i can't think of ANY down time here.
#nothingtotweetabout the crickets, tumbleweed, and i are having a hoedown.
glad i got one night of holiday cheer in. woo christmas.
my siblings are convinced they can diagnose my dad's slipping mind via email. they are now filtered. i prefer to accept him as is.
my family and email... why did these two things have to ever have to find each other.
tried to do a simple tween in flash cs4 the other day. gave up and opened cs3. i love change, except when i'm in a hurry.
